boolopt.name: Help
boolopt.short_desc: Display help and exit
boolopt.long_desc: Display the textual help message and exit immediately without furthur processing.

boolopt.name: Exhaustive
boolopt.short_desc: file list is exhaustive
boolopt.long_desc: The Provided list of files represents all files that will be in the execution environment.

boolopt.name: Dynamic linking
boolopt.short_desc: Force dynamic linking
boolopt.long_desc: No static linking is done.

boolopt.name: Prettyprint
boolopt.short_desc: Prettyprint the files
boolopt.long_desc: Prettyprints the input files. Overides all other options.

boolopt.name: XML IR
boolopt.short_desc: Prints the xml IR
boolopt.long_desc: Print the XML IR after performing various transformations.

boolopt.name: Matlab Input
boolopt.short_desc: Use Matlab files as input
boolopt.long_desc: Use Matlab files as input rather than Natlab ones.

boolopt.name: Quiet mode
boolopt.short_desc: Suppress all information messages
boolopt.long_desc: All messages will be suppressed, unless an error occurs.

stropt.name: Output Directory
stropt.short_desc: Output everything to this dir rather than stdout
stropt.long_desc: Each file is outputted to a file of the same name in the given directory. The path of the input file is ignored when outputting.

boolopt.name: Server mode
boolopt.short_desc: Run frontend in server mode on a given port, default is 47146
boolopt.long_desc: Run the frontend as a server. Opens a socket on a given port and waits for XML encoded commands.

stropt.name: Server port
stropt.short_desc: Set the port the server runs on
stropt.long_desc: Set the server to run on a given port. Default is 47146.

boolopt.name: No heartbeat
boolopt.short_desc: Turns off the need for a heartbeat signal
boolopt.long_desc: The server will no longer try to detect broken connections using a the heartbeat signal.

boolopt.name: DirectorySearch Options
boolopt.short_desc: Run Dependence Analysis on the files in the given directory
boolopt.long_desc: Run Dependence Analysis on the input file in a given directory to figure out dependence relations.Starting from the driver file.

boolopt.name: DependenceAnalysis
boolopt.short_desc: Run Dependence Analysis on the input file
boolopt.long_desc: Run Dependence Analysis on the input file to figure out dependence relations.

boolopt.name: Prof
boolopt.short_desc: Run profiler on the input file
boolopt.long_desc: Run profiler on the input file to instrument code.

boolopt.name: auto
boolopt.short_desc: Apply loop transformations automatically
boolopt.long_desc: Apply loop transformations automatically.

boolopt.name: anno
boolopt.short_desc: Apply annotated loop transformations
boolopt.long_desc: Apply annotated loop transformations.

boolopt.name: Heur
boolopt.short_desc: Invoke heuristic engine to predict range data
boolopt.long_desc: Invoke heuristic engine component to predict range data.

boolopt.name: Rda
boolopt.short_desc: Do run time dependence analysis on the input file
boolopt.long_desc: Do run time dependence analysis on the input file.

boolopt.name: Sda
boolopt.short_desc: Do static dependence analysis on the input file
boolopt.long_desc: Do static dependence analysis on the input file using the precomputed information.

boolopt.name: GCD
boolopt.short_desc: Run Gcd test on the input file
boolopt.long_desc: Run Gcd Test on the loops in the input file to figure out dependence relations.

boolopt.name: BanerJee's Test
boolopt.short_desc: Run Banerjee test on the input file
boolopt.long_desc: Run Banerjee's Test on the loops in the input file to figure out dependence relations.

boolopt.name: Generate Fortran
boolopt.short_desc: Generates fortran code
boolopt.long_desc: Run the fortran code generator to produce a fortran code representation of the input sounce.
